<!-- FULL-SCREEN VIDEO HERO -->
<div class="video-hero-section">
  <video autoplay muted loop playsinline id="bg-video" poster="www/ai-poster.jpg">
    <source src="www/ai.mp4" type="video/mp4">
    Your browser does not support the video tag.
  </video>


<div class="video-hero-content">
    <h2>CASHEW BOT</h2>
    <h2>ICAR - Directorate of Cashew Research, Puttur</h2>
  </div>
</div>

<style>
.video-hero-section {
  position: relative;
  width: 100vw;
  height: 100vh;
  margin-left: calc(-50vw + 50%);
  overflow: hidden;
}

.video-hero-section video {
  position: absolute;
  top: 50%;
  left: 50%;
  min-width: 100%;
  min-height: 100%;
  width: auto;
  height: auto;
  transform: translate(-50%, -50%);
  object-fit: cover;
  z-index: 1;
}

/* Center the text both vertically and horizontally */
.video-hero-content {
  position: absolute;
  top: 50%;
  left: 50%;
  transform: translate(-50%, -50%);
  z-index: 2;
  text-align: center;
  color: white;
  padding: 20px 40px;
  background: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4);
  border-radius: 10px;
  text-shadow: 0 2px 12px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.6);
}

.video-hero-content h1 {
  margin: 0;
  font-size: 3rem;
  font-weight: bold;
}

.video-hero-content h2 {
  margin: 0;
  font-size: 1.5rem;
  font-weight: normal;
}

.video-hero-section::before {
  content: "";
  position: absolute;
  inset: 0;
  background: linear-gradient(180deg, rgba(0,0,0,0.15), rgba(0,0,0,0.45));
  z-index: 1;
}
</style>
```

<!-- Boxes Section -->
<div class="boxes-section">
  <div class="box">
    <img src="www/image1.jpg" alt="Image 1">
    <a href="https://chat.openai.com" target="_blank">Cashew Chat Bot</a>
  </div>

  <div class="box">
    <img src="www/image2.jpg" alt="Image 2">
    <a href="https://telegram.org" target="_blank">Telegram Bot</a>
  </div>

  <div class="box">
    <img src="www/image3.jpg" alt="Image 3">
    <a href="https://icar.org.in" target="_blank">Extension Agents</a>
  </div>
</div>

<style>
/* Container holding the three boxes */
.boxes-section {
  display: flex;
  justify-content: center;
  gap: 20px;
  padding: 40px;
  background: #f8f8f8;
  flex-wrap: wrap; /* Makes it responsive */
}

/* Each box */
.box {
  background: white;
  border-radius: 10px;
  overflow: hidden;
  width: 350px;
  box-shadow: 0 4px 15px rgba(0,0,0,0.1);
  text-align: center;
  transition: transform 0.3s ease;
}

/* Hover effect */
.box:hover {
  transform: translateY(-5px);
}

/* Image inside the box */
.box img {
  width: 100%;
  height: 250px;
  object-fit: cover;
}

/* Link text */
.box a {
  display: block;
  padding: 15px;
  color: #007BFF;
  font-size: 1.2rem;
  font-weight: bold;
  text-decoration: none;
  transition: color 0.3s ease;
}

.box a:hover {
  color: #0056b3;
}
</style>
```
